label: 綾
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 52nd  . Nara National Museum . 2000
説明文: In the Shōsō-in, this term refers primarily to monochrome textiles of degummed silk with repeated pattern floats in a twill structure over a twill-or plain-weave foundation. These textiles were typically dyed after being woven. [正倉院]
